description: Senior Software Engineer with over 11 years of experience in cutting-edge web technology development, specializing in performance optimization, UI/UX, and scalable architecture. Experienced in leading technical teams, ensuring code quality, and mentoring developers to enhance team efficiency.
heroDescriptionPart2: Specialized in frontend architecture, performance optimization, and building engineering teams that ship exceptional products.
